UploadQuestionTxt: What Everquest class combines attributes of a Warrior and a Necromancer?
UploadExplnText: The Shadow Knight class combines Warrior (fighting/tanking) and Necromancer (lifestealing/lifeanimation/damage over time).

UploadQuestionTxt: What Everquest class can only use 2 Hand weapons?
UploadExplnText: Only the Berzerker class is restricted to 2 Hand weapons only.

UploadQuestionTxt: What classes are known as "Pet Classes" in Everquest?
UploadExplnText: The "true" Everquest "Pet Classes" are Necromancer, Beastlord and Magician.

UploadQuestionTxt: What two classes can teleport groups? And testing Nonsense characters to exceed 256 character field limit zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ
UploadExplnText: The transport classes are Druid and Wizard.  Other classes can teleport themselves but not others.
